nodes.bodyText: Is it fine to have both of them here?
It's actually needed. Adjuncts do not go through the build pipeline and thus we need to set the fallbacks for CSS variables manually.

@timja just a comment. I put these non-color variables in this file because I didn't know where else to put them. I'm thinking on creating a follow-up PR to rename this file to theme.less and include the font variables as well. WDYT?
